C:/home/LearnHVAC/spark/class/air_enthsat.cm File Reference

Psychrometric relationship between dry bulb temperature and enthalpy at the saturation point. SI units. More...

Detailed Description

Psychrometric relationship between dry bulb temperature and enthalpy at the saturation point. SI units.

Based on the 1989 ASHRAE handbook - Fundamentals

Interface variables
  • pAtm Atmospheric pressure [Pa]
  • TDb Dry bulb temperature [deg_C]
  • hSat Enthalpy at saturation [J/kg_dryAir]

Local variables
  • wSat Humidity ratio at saturation [kg_water/kg_dryAir]

Equations
 (hm)    wSat = air_humratio( pAtm, Pw )
 (sp)    Pw   = air_satpress( TDb )
 (ea)    hSat = air_enthalpy( TDb, wSat )

Warning:
TDb preferred as break variable to facilitate specifying an initial predictor. Better choice than Pw that might lead to w -> inf!!!
History
  • 050711 Chadi Maalouf (LEPTAB)
    • Initial implementation.
